plays.text: Penalty to Erik Rasmussen 2 minutes for Boarding Kirk Maltby

Penalty to Alexander Frolov 2 minutes for Hooking Sergei Fedorov

Penalty to Luc Robitaille 2 minutes for Holding Jon Sim
Penalty to Jon Sim 2 minutes for Diving Luc Robitaille

Penalty to Sergei Fedorov 2 minutes for Tripping Jon Sim
Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for High Sticking Bryan Smolinski

Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Roughing Alexander Frolov
Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy assisted by Alexander Frolov and JOSEPH CORVO
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Roughing Derek Armstrong
